root.title: treasuri balanc fed rise feb 25
root.body: treasuri balanc feder reserv rise feb 25 4.151 billion dlr 2.727 billion dlr previou busi day treasuri say late budget statement balanc tax loan note account fell 25.137 billion dlr 25.780 billion dlr respect day treasuri oper cash balanc total 29.289 billion dlr feb 25 compar 28.507 billion dlr feb 24
